parameters:
Oh my, such a cute girl visiting my home...! This is quite
exhilarating\I[15]

(Wow, that's a lot of loincloths! Is this a loincloth
shop...? It feels like I've accidentally come to the house
of someone with peculiar tastes.)

Ho ho ho--! You seem quite surprised by my collection, don't
you? Rest assured, none of these are stolen. They are all
handcrafted by me.

There are so many loincloths, aren't there? They're thinner
and shorter than normal ones... Could it be that all of
these are...

Exactly! They are loincloths for women! I handcrafted them
myself because I want not only men but also women to wear
them!

Eh!? But, loincloths are only worn by men, right? At most,
women might wrap a towel around their waist, but I've never
seen a woman wearing a loincloth...

That's right! That's precisely why women need loincloths
too. What do you say, young lady? Would you like to try one
on?
--Eh!? You want me to wear a loincloth?

I'll lend it to you for free. And please return it to
me\I[15] I'll also give you a small reward for it! (Haa...
haa...!)

(...This person seems to have that as his motive... He's
offering a reward too, what should I do...)
ふんどしを借りる\c[17]【イベントＣＧ】\c[0]

I'm sorry! It's a very kind offer, but I'm in a hurry--! So,
if you'll excuse me!
--Karin hastily left the home of the loincloth enthusiast!

Thank you for last time\I[15]Actually, I've made a new
loincloth--
